description:
Pudding and Sanji arrive at Cacao Island and begin to remake the only cake that will calm Big Mom! But their fake nuptials get in the way as they bicker like a married couple! Meanwhile, Luffy has lost the battle of his life - and the flame goes out of him... until the Sunny becomes the target of a new threat!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Hard Battle Starts! Luffy vs. Katakuri!
Der Kampf geht weiter! – Ruffy gegen Katakuri
Le combat commence. Luffy contre Katakuri !
Тяжелая битва начинается! Луффи против Катакури!
تبدأ معركة صعبة! لوفي ضدّ كاتاكوري
激闘開幕 ルフィVS[たい]カタクリ
